hint: Convert implicit joins to explicit JOIN syntax for better cardinality estimation, push selective filters (date_dim, customer_address) earliest possible, and pre-filter dimension tables before joining.
Isolate selective date_dim filter into a CTE, pre-filter all dimension tables (cd1, cd2, customer_address, reason) into separate CTEs, then join with fact tables using explicit joins.
Materialize pre-filtered dimension and fact subsets (web_sales, web_returns) into CTEs, then perform joins; consider splitting OR conditions into separate CTEs for union-based recombination.
Transform OR conditions into UNION of separate subqueries, use EXISTS/NOT EXISTS for correlation elimination, and restructure joins to reduce Cartesian product risks in the disjunctive predicates.
